text.div: • Include codes from http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ActStatus where concept is-a suspended

name: ActStatusSuspended
title: ActStatusSuspended
description: An Act that has been activated (actions could or have been performed against it), but has been temporarily disabled. No further action should be taken against it until it is released
